mdRecord.dcterms:title: Cupping set
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This cupping set was owned and used by Drs. Benjamin Smith Middleton and Benjamin Arthur Middleton of Emmerton, Virginia. The wooden box that holds the set is lined with blue-green velvet and has space for 6 cupping glasses, box is 8" x 5.25" x 4". Set includes 5 cupping glasses and 7 blade scarificator in a red box. Two illegible words and the word "Philadelphia" are stamped on the scarificator. [original]
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments and apparatus
